title: Microsoft Word for Windows 2.0. V.1. Introductory skills
brief_description: This step-by-step training video, developed by LearnPC, is intended as a basic introduction to word processing using Word for Windows 2.0. Narrated by Sheila Swanson, you’ll learn the basics of Microsoft Windows, how to create and save a document, editing, formatting and printing.
